item.title: Technical Program Chairs’ Welcome
item.description: Woon-Seng Gan Professor, Nanyang Technological University Kai-Kuang Ma Professor, Nanyang Technological University It is our greatest pleasure to welcome all of you to the first tandem-hybrid ICASSP 2022. ICASSP is the world’s largest and most comprehensive technical conference focused on signal processing and its applications. This year’s edition of ICASSP is a departure from the virtual conferences held over the past two years due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
